text: Bulldog lightfish, also known as Ichthyococcus irregularis, is a species of the genus Ichthyococcus.http://www.fishbase.us/Summary/SpeciesSummary.php?id=57233 Ichthyococcus intermedius info on Fishbase ==References== Category:Ichthyococcus Category:Fish described in 1958
title: Bulldog lightfish
